duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspire and lead a sales team to create exceptional customer experiences in retail stores.
Develop and mentor sales specialists, drive sales targets, and ensure effective store merchandising.
Resolve customer issues, assist with transactions, and provide an exceptional customer experience.
Identify selling skill gaps, create development plans, and lead the team to meet and exceed sales metrics.
Manage store operations, analyze staffing needs, report financial and sales data, and ensure compliance with company expectations.
Monitor inventory, restock shelves, maintain device security, and ensure store cleanliness.
Manage store merchandising and planogram compliance according to company expectations.
Complete store opening and closing activities.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree or two or more years of work experience.
Relevant work experience of three or more years.
Willingness to work evenings, weekends, and holidays.
Willingness to work across two locations within close proximity to one another (based on business needs).
